name: Sumersault Morgan 9-Piece Nursery in a Bag Crib Bedding Set with BONUS Bumper

reviews.name: Sumersault Morgan 9-Piece Nursery in a Bag Crib Bedding Set with BONUS Bumper
reviews.reviewText: I love this crib set. The colors are great and the quality is excallent. Let's be honest, you can't beat that price!!
reviews.title: So cute

reviews.name: Sumersault Morgan 9-Piece Nursery in a Bag Crib Bedding Set with BONUS Bumper
reviews.reviewText: I was really iffy on ordering this for my baby girls nursery! I gave it a shot and everything is perfect. It actually looks better in person then what it does online! Perfect for the money! Cant wait to set up the nursery with this perfect bundle!
reviews.title: Perfect for the price.

reviews.name: Sumersault Morgan 9-Piece Nursery in a Bag Crib Bedding Set with BONUS Bumper
reviews.reviewText: Can't wait to use it because it's adorable!!
reviews.title: So cute

reviews.name: Sumersault Morgan 9-Piece Nursery in a Bag Crib Bedding Set with BONUS Bumper
reviews.reviewText: I'm very happy with my purchase ,just what I imagined
reviews.title: Perfect bedding

reviews.name: Sumersault Morgan 9-Piece Nursery in a Bag Crib Bedding Set with BONUS Bumper
reviews.reviewText: I loved the pattern on this beautiful baby girl crib bedding. I especially loved how many pieces came with the set. The pictures and diaper stacker that came with the bedding set was a nice bonus. I would highly recommend this product as it not only is beautiful, and well made, but also is a great price.
reviews.title: Beautiful Baby Girl Bedding
